metadata.name: Akira Tree
metadata.description:
* Akira is Japanese for “wisdom,” and it is a popular term. This name is said to mean “to the sun.”


Storyline:

In Akira anime, we see many metaphors for forgetting the past and also the disappearance of cultures.
Is this the price we have to pay for modernity?

Our illustration is an inspired concept based on the chaotic world of Katsuhiro Otomo. Cultures are going to be forgotten and the last JAPANESSE MAPLE stands as the only remnant of Japanese culture among the ruins of Neo-Tokyo against Tetsuo.

The same old story, Tradition vs Modernity.
